PageTitle: bestroute igp-metric-ignore (BGP-IPv4 unicast address family view)
FuncDef:
The bestroute igp-metric-ignore command configures BGP to ignore the IGP cost when selecting the optimal route.
The undo bestroute igp-metric-ignore command restores the default configuration. The bestroute igp-metric-ignore command configures BGP to ignore the IGP cost when selecting the optimal route. The undo bestroute igp-metric-ignore command restores the default configuration. By default, BGP uses the IGP cost as one of route selection rules.
